title: Besu and Quorum peering fails with Eth65 subprotocol

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

labels.name: P3
labels.description: Medium (ex: JSON-RPC request not working with a specific client library due to loose spec assumtion)

body:
The latest version of Besu (git b5113e715f6afdf01f7357453905423aa6d3488a) is failing to establish a peer with latest Quorum (git 44959d08568d22a6dd9ffa20271a3d0f7459dbbf) using eth65.

Error occurs when Besu sends a GetBlockHeadersData message to Quorum which Quorum fails to decode.

```
2021-08-27 10:18:24.373+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.402+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | EthProtocolManager | Sending status message to Peer 0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666....
2021-08-27 10:18:24.373+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.402+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | TRACE | AbstractPeerConnection | Writing org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.messages.StatusMessage@92a2d171 to PeerInfo{version=5, clientId='Geth/quorum/v1.9.24-stable-972809e3(quorum-v21.7.1)/linux-amd64/go1.15.5', capabilities=[eth/63, eth/64, eth/65, istanbul/64, istanbul/99, istanbul/100], port=0, nodeId=0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666f6815117e471bcfef7d847b0da3c10f1eccf4c0a9a1c96cdf405ff1ba4e0a4ffc782be34764e47e8aebeadc2dee16395a41df512c17844} via protocol eth/65
2021-08-27 10:18:24.374+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: TRACE[08-27|00:18:24.403|eth/downloader/downloader.go:310]                Registering sync peer                    peer=b746e9fe7c498e57
2021-08-27 10:18:24.374+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: DEBUG[08-27|00:18:24.403|eth/quorum_protocol.go:65]                       consensus subprotocol retrieved eth peer from peerset id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       ethPeer.id=b746e9fe7c498e57 ProtoName=istanbul
2021-08-27 10:18:24.375+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.404+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | TRACE | EthProtocolManager | Process message eth/65, 0
2021-08-27 10:18:24.376+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.404+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | EthProtocolManager | Received status message from Peer 0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666...: org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.messages.StatusMessage@92a2d171
2021-08-27 10:18:24.376+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.405+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | ChainHeadTracker | Requesting chain head info for Peer 0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666...
2021-08-27 10:18:24.377+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.406+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | GetHeadersFromPeerByHashTask | Requesting 1 headers from peer Peer 0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666....
2021-08-27 10:18:24.377+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.406+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | TRACE | AbstractPeerConnection | Writing RawMessage{code=3, data=0xe680e4a0aac4bda4c5ba587e5a1e08fe1bfc3a9f394cda1c899914d07524c86193c8ce3f018080} to PeerInfo{version=5, clientId='Geth/quorum/v1.9.24-stable-972809e3(quorum-v21.7.1)/linux-amd64/go1.15.5', capabilities=[eth/63, eth/64, eth/65, istanbul/64, istanbul/99, istanbul/100], port=0, nodeId=0x2a3cd1b7c15b1fb666f6815117e471bcfef7d847b0da3c10f1eccf4c0a9a1c96cdf405ff1ba4e0a4ffc782be34764e47e8aebeadc2dee16395a41df512c17844} via protocol eth/65
2021-08-27 10:18:24.378+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.407+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | WaitForPeerTask | Finished waiting for peer connection.
2021-08-27 10:18:24.378+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.407+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | INFO  | FullSyncTargetManager | No sync target, waiting for peers: 1
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: DEBUG[08-27|00:18:24.408|eth/handler.go:418]                              Ethereum message handling failed         id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       err="Invalid message - msg #3 (39 bytes): invalid message: (code 3) (size 39) rlp: expected input string or byte for uint64, decoding into (eth.getBlockHeadersData).Amount"
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-1453587586 | INFO  | Web3Provider | besu: 2021-08-27 00:18:24.408+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | DEBUG | WaitForPeerTask | Waiting for new peer connection. 1 peers currently connected.
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: DEBUG[08-27|00:18:24.408|eth/handler.go:254]                              Removing Ethereum peer                   peer=b746e9fe7c498e57
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: TRACE[08-27|00:18:24.408|eth/downloader/downloader.go:331]                Unregistering sync peer                  peer=b746e9fe7c498e57
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: TRACE[08-27|00:18:24.408|p2p/peer.go:399]                                 Protocol eth/65 failed                   id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       err="Invalid message - msg #3 (39 bytes): invalid message: (code 3) (size 39) rlp: expected input string or byte for uint64, decoding into (eth.getBlockHeadersData).Amount"
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: DEBUG[08-27|00:18:24.408|eth/quorum_protocol.go:92]                       Ethereum quorum message handling failed  id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       err=EOF
```

This seems to be interesting part decoding the getBlockHeadersData struct
```
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: TRACE[08-27|00:18:24.408|p2p/peer.go:399]                                 Protocol eth/65 failed                   id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       err="Invalid message - msg #3 (39 bytes): invalid message: (code 3) (size 39) rlp: expected input string or byte for uint64, decoding into (eth.getBlockHeadersData).Amount"
2021-08-27 10:18:24.379+10:00 | docker-java-stream-733481287 | INFO  | Web3Provider | quorum: DEBUG[08-27|00:18:24.408|eth/quorum_protocol.go:92]                       Ethereum quorum message handling failed  id=b746e9fe7c498e57 conn=staticdial       err=EOF
```
